00040 class KVILIB_API KviSharedFile : public KviHeapObject
00041 {
00042 public:
00043         KviSharedFile(const QString &szName,const QString &szAbsPath,const QString &szUserMask,time_t expireTime,unsigned int uFileSize);
00044         ~KviSharedFile();
00045 private:
00046         QString         m_szName;
00047         QString         m_szAbsFilePath;
00048         time_t          m_expireTime;
00049         QString         m_szUserMask;
00050         unsigned int    m_uFileSize;
00051         unsigned int    m_uWildCount;
00052         unsigned int    m_uNonWildCount;
00053 public:
00054         const QString &name(){ return m_szName; };
00055 
00056         const QString &absFilePath(){ return m_szAbsFilePath; };
00057 
00058         const QString &userMask(){ return m_szUserMask; };
00059 
00060         time_t       expireTime(){ return m_expireTime; };
00061         bool         expires(){ return (m_expireTime != 0); };
00062 
00063         unsigned int fileSize(){ return m_uFileSize; };
00064 
00065         unsigned int wildcardCount(){ return m_uWildCount; };
00066         unsigned int nonWildcardCount(){ return m_uNonWildCount; };
00067         int          maskLength(){ return m_szUserMask.length(); };
00068 };
